website_summaries.verdict: A great laptop for the gamer who's all business during the day and all RPG at night, the MSI GS65 Stealth Thin 8RF balances both sides  of you with aplomb.
pros: The MSI GS65 Stealth Thin 8RF has a slim, attractive design with a thin-bezel display that doesn't scream "I game!"
It doesn't sacrifice any connections and delivers solid performance, a better-than-average display and decent battery life for its class
cons: The keyboard keycaps are a bit slippery, and it can get pretty hot when running at maximum power or get loud when unleashing the fans to compensate

customer_reviews.title: Competitive Thin and Light Gaming Laptop
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a laptop that can play any modern game yet still weigh and feel like a regular laptop, this is the one. The IPS screen has a little bit of backlight bleed from a particular section, but is only noticeable when the screen is displaying black. I had to re-paste the CPU with Thermal Grizzly Conductonaut to eliminate the CPU thermal throttling that always occurred during full CPU load. Speakers evidently lack bass or treble, but I'll be using my headphones or desktop speakers most of the time anyway.
customer_reviews.author: On Go

customer_reviews.title: Perfect laptop for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking and looking for the perfect laptop. Finally I decided to go with MSI hardware. This laptop is a art.....light weight but all metal around it feels superior. The color with a little of copper accent give a rich feeling and it looks neat. It's fast - so far - not overheating; however, I have not used it for anything power hungry yet. The keyboard ilumination is splendid. You can choose from several different options to accomedate your perfect color! I think everybody would like this pretty toy and of course I wish it could be a little more affordable but it's money worth from any angle!
customer_reviews.author: Valdi

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excited to push and test this product. After a week of use it is great, no complaints! Some reviews complain about build quality but it is rigid enough, light weight and looks great. No complaints. Fans can be loud at times but that is to be expected with any gaming platform especially a lightweight laptop! Track pad could be larger, but it was better than expected. Screen quality is great, a little light bleed when dark but it is very sharp and responsive! All around would recommend. Decided to get this instead of Razer Blade 15, no regrets for the saved $500
customer_reviews.author: Safranek's

customer_reviews.title: Surprising battery capacity and performance for the size
customer_reviews.text: This is the second MSI stealth laptop I have owned, the previous one was purchased about 4 years previous and has handled everything that I threw at it admirably. This laptop is on the scale of some of the thinnest and lightest laptops I have used, but with the power of a gaming desktop. The sheer usability is excellent. It can also handle ours off the plug (4-5 depedning on use). It can heat up quite a bit, but the on board fans do a good job keeping up. You're best not keeping it on your lap when you are really getting into a gaming session anyways. Be prepared to be blown away by the improvements over previous computers.
customer_reviews.author: Jbrandersen

customer_reviews.title: Garbage display
customer_reviews.text: Claims this is UHD but put next to 2 other laptops is nowhere near as clear and high quality, a $700 Toshiba laptop that is 5 years old has a better display. Laptop itself is gorgeous, feels great, love the logo love the case, hardware wise its fast but display is terrible, for 2k it should be amazing. We are a business and don't leave bad reviews unless we want others to read them for a reason, most MSI Stuff is good we have at least 10k + in their stuff and wont influence us not to buy more, but I think the bezel battery technology makes the display terrible.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Best Thinnest Laptop ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I purchased from amazon and MSI. The laptop is super thin and powerful. The specs that are listed here were exactly spot on. The most exciting part is the design of the laptop. Yes, it is small but the thin design is beautiful.The lit up keyboard is super cool if you are not into gaming . There is also the MSI function key when pressed only function keys are lit up.The powerful nvidia 1070 gives full performance towards games without any lag. Keyboard is really smooth and the touch pad goes along with it. With all this power it is really stealthy.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Update: not worth 2k
customer_reviews.text: overall am happy with the purchase Pros - durable - metal chassis - 144hz and rgb keys - 1070 Q gtx card - fast charging Cons - need to be repaired as screen bleed is a problem - power doesnt last as long as i thought - Q gtx as opposed to Ti Update: 6 months after purchase fans acting sporadically and obnoxiously upon startup. will go to maximum output, down to none, and pitch like this for almost a minute before stopping. not unusable but highly annoying and not something I find acceptable in a 2k laptop.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your penny. Worst Support Ever.
customer_reviews.text: From the day I bought it, first I had to replace the WiFi Card(2 months), then the CPU fan(6months), then after 1 year, literally stopped working. When sent to MSI, they quoted 1300$ for motherboard replacement when the laptop itself is 1500$. It has been a huge pain since the day I bought it. Always overheating, collects dust to the fans and makes whirring noise (inspire of cleaning very often). Save some pain in your life. Go for a Razer or MacBook Pro for the same price. MSIs support is the worst there is out there.
customer_reviews.author: Rama Prashanth

customer_reviews.title: Thin, light and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: The computer is incredibly thin and light (for its processing power). The image is amazing and is impressive how they fit a 15 in screen in a 14.2 in frame. Set up was easy and voice recognition was great, considering I have a fairly strong accent. Have not used it to run any game with heavy requirements so far, but will provide an update to my review as soon as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Annelise

customer_reviews.title: Minor cosmetic imperfections but great laptop
customer_reviews.text: I would like to say that I love this laptop. After liquid metal modding it, it becomes much more quiet during gaming after tweaking the fan software too. The laptop does experience micro stuttering which can be solved by using the GPU only, but besides that this is one fast laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas W.

customer_reviews.title: The matte black finish is a finger print magnet.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for almost a week now, the feel is great and the screen is butter smoothe. I got this laptop for school so the subtle but classy look and great portability is a plus. It has pretty solid IO and the keyboard had a great feel with solid build quality. Overall, it’s a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lbson

customer_reviews.title: Crashed after two weeks.  Terrible MSI customer support.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product approximately three weeks ago. After about two weeks of light use, one service after another began to die. It started with the battery no longer getting charged and then progressed to the ethernet port not recognizing cables. I am not sure what has caused all these issues, but after reaching out to MSI customer support I was advised to invest in a volt meter to test my AC charger. After spending $2000 on a laptop I don't expect to get told to invest in a volt meter and figure it out myself. Extremely disappointed with the customer service MSI has provided. A shame since the laptop itself was doing great up until that point.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: A gaming wonder
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is phenomenal. Everything about this machine is excellent! I can run any game on the highest settings, apps work great, and the keyboard and build quality are top notch. Without any exceptions, this MSI is exceptional!
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop and customer support!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing laptop that does well with any games I throw at it. I ended up adding another SSD to the system to give it more storage space. But while doing so I sparked the motherboard messing up the display. I thought I was screwed, but I sent it into MSI and they fixed it for free with no issues! The repairs would have costed almost the price of the system for me to do it myself. I'm grateful for the amazing support I received from them for my dumb mistake. I definitely recommend their products!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Young

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance, thin, and excellent build quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Nvidia 1070 version of the laptop, games run super smooth! It has an extra m.2 slot that I used to install a 1 TB SSD in for extra storage! The install was a little bit of a pain because the motherboard is installed with the components facing down but it was worth taking the time to do it. Overall slim and pretty light. Not overly "gamery" look which I appreciate. Keyboard feels great to type on. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Rios

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: GS65 Stealth Thin is great! Bezel is really small, screen is buttery smooth, and the FPS is great so far in games like Fortnite & League of Legends. Build quality is great, it looks low profile / professional on the outside, but shows off it's gaming flair on the inside with the customizable steelseries keyboard! Overall really enjoy it. I wanted to buy the Razer Blade 2018 but this is basically it for hundreds of dollars less. Thanks MSI!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary A.

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy it. The keyboard is my favorite part
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited about this computer. I really enjoy it. The keyboard is my favorite part. The only thing I don't enjoy is that the battery life has never lasted me 8+ hours and the bottom gets OVERLY hot. There's also not much storage room. The charger is also quite bulky, but I love how long it is. Other than that, the look is beautiful and I love the big display. I'm very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: It's perfectly sized and performs remarkably well.
customer_reviews.text: The 144 Hz monitor and the form factor were the biggest deciding factors for buying this laptop. It looks way more professional than its peers, which is a definite plus since I primarily bought this laptop as a companion for my work laptop while traveling for business. The only complaint I have is that access to the M.2 slots to add an additional SSD requires you to almost completely disassemble the laptop, but overall it was well-worth the price. I would definitely recommend this laptop to anybody looking to game while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Knox

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast
customer_reviews.text: The laptop was already registered to someone else when I tried to register online. Also the laptop was a bit dirty, the top cover looked like someone placed a cup on it. Edit: I talked to customer service and they handled the issue very. They were able to free the registration. The laptop is running nicely. Testing playing Quake Champions and it runs smoothly! Laptop gets hot , but the fans are able to stabilize the temperature. Loving also the LED keyboard colors. Just wish the Hard drive space was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben R.

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, I love everything about it. Especially since this is my first high end laptop, the 1070 Version, runs everything extremely well, only con is maybe the fans which aren’t even that loud. Although I did get a cooling pad w/ fans just to on the safer side of the thermals, but without it, it still performs well. Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Trieu Tran

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: This machine is fast and has everything you need with tons of ports and solid hardware. The construction is seamless and durable. Screen resolution has kept up with all my games and looks sharp. The keyboard changing colors is a nice feature. The only downside is there are other laptops that have better battery life, but I still get an hour and a half playing games or 5 hours in word/excel. You don’t buy a Lamborghini for the gas mileage though!
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Owens

customer_reviews.title: This is the start of something great!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is a huge upgrade from my last laptop. I am just beginning to use it, but already it is blowing me away with everything that it can do. The display is amazing, it loads things so fast. I'm going to have to get an additional harddrive for it though because 256 GB isnt going to last very long. So excited to see what all this thing can do.
customer_reviews.author: Kaerf_susej

customer_reviews.title: ok-ish build quality, wanky msi software, decent keyboard, good battery life, thermal throttled.
customer_reviews.text: All good, with some tweaking 7h of word processing usage is achievable. However after 6 months, just after the warranty ends, the green LED on some of the keys died. I'm not an RGB lover, but buying a $1600 only for the LED to die after several months is not a good trade. Many users also reported similar problem.
customer_reviews.author: RasyadArkan

customer_reviews.title: So far it runs beautifully! It is extremely quick and handles everything I've ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this PC for only a few days. So far it runs beautifully! It is extremely quick and handles everything I've thrown at it. So far, the batteries first charge lasted unexpectedly long. The only downlaff is the computer runs hot left of the keyboard. This isn't a game breaker by any means, but it is suprisingly hot!
customer_reviews.author: Matt k.

customer_reviews.title: It looks amazing, and feels amazing
customer_reviews.text: The construction on this laptop feels premium. It looks amazing, and feels amazing. I immediately put it through its paces and this machine screams. I'm incredibly impressed, and will be buying another MSI in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Moore

customer_reviews.title: Light and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked laptops that were light enough to carry around, but I didn't like how weak they were in terms of processing power. This laptop is a good balance of both being able to run AAA games with relative ease while not weighing as much as a math textbook.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mirabella

customer_reviews.title: Slim, Light, Quick, and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: This is the first MSI machine I’ve purchased. I am not disappointed. For the price, it’s delivering in all the right ways. I have never been a laptop user. The specs for them are not up to desktop standards. I’m realizing now, as I need portability, there are great systems out there and this is one of them!
customer_reviews.author: jeff ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Good for character modelling
customer_reviews.text: I'm a character modeler and constantly use heavy software like Zbrush, substance painter, etc and I sometimes I use several at the same time. This computer can handle them with no problem. It's also light and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEAST
customer_reviews.text: This monster of a laptop can run most AAA games at ultra settings at a solid 60 fps and above. runs very quickly and feels snappy as you navigate through the settings. It can run for around 6 hours regular use and about 1 hour 30 min gaming. great laptop, and a great battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Powerful Machine
customer_reviews.text: This laptop perfectly met my expectations for it. The sleek exterior design perfectly fits my aesthetic, along with the quiet fans and great versatility I would definitely say it was a worthwhile purchase! My only complaint is that the product shipped late, and my schedule could not accommodate very well.
customer_reviews.author: Aishwarya Dey

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Came in Defective. Laptop barely turned on and the screen was massively distorted. Overheated within seconds because fans would now kick on. 1/10 for functionality. 9/10 for looks
customer_reviews.author: Cody Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great powerful lightweight laptop
customer_reviews.text: After opening the box i was surprised at how lightweight this laptop is. I expected it to be a little more hefty, but it is still built very well. The screen is very impressive and looks great. The keyboard lights are a nice touch too. Definitely pleased with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: its so thin and shinny!!
customer_reviews.text: i just got mine and lets just say i am almost satisfied lol!! i havent started any games yet but im loading guild wars 2 up right now!!! this laptop feels like butter under my fingers and the bezels are so this and sexy!! i am keeping this until it the day this laptop goes kaput!
customer_reviews.author: Lexus

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop, but build quality is slightly lacking
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this for a week now, and have to say it's a great laptop. I previously owned a larger ASUS gaming laptop and while sturdier, was basically a desktop that moved around every now and then. This is a great fit for someone looking to work and play with the same machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to business trips.
customer_reviews.text: Received the computer today, out of the box I instantly notice the power in this gaming laptop. It runs so smoothly and the keyboard has a nice feel to it. Very responsive but not too noisy. The laptop itself is very compact and will be very useful for when I'm travelling and want to play games away from home.
customer_reviews.author: WBoyle

customer_reviews.title: Ticks all the boxes (almost)
customer_reviews.text: Laptop games well, works well, travels well, well built. No bloatware. Light but sturdy adapter. The one downside is the standard drive size. It is expandable but be advised the mobo is upside down and will require proper tools and a steady hand to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: The speakers are loud and the screen is a good size. Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is very sleek and lightweight. The fans aren't too loud and the laptop thus far has not gotten very hot. The laptop also runs very quickly. The speakers are loud and the screen is a good size. Love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is fast!  And quiet!  And hot!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fast! And quiet! And hot! I'm looking for a tray or cooling solution to go with.
customer_reviews.author: trololo

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, lightweight, and powerful. Exactly what I was looking for in my machine. Decent enough battery life. Working well so far. There is a creak near the front right side that is a little annoying and it comes with a ton of bloatware that was easy enough to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Chewie

customer_reviews.title: 1st Gaming laptop and it is GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: The laptop looks and is amazing. The flex on the laptop is really flexing if you know what I mean. But I personally think it is because that the laptop is held a little higher than most laptops to allow airflow into the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: MafiaKingKao

customer_reviews.title: Love the portability of the laptop
customer_reviews.text: Love the portability of the laptop! This is why ill never buy an apple computer because you get so much more out of thin gaming laptop this. The 1070 is good enough to play any game and the 144hz is a huge step up from 60hz.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this laptop
customer_reviews.text: Loving this laptop. it meets the performance and video quality that I expect from this laptop. Strongly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Really great computer
customer_reviews.text: Really great computer, can't think of a single complaint. Got exactly what I expected - great performance in a small package. Lives up to the hype for sure.
customer_reviews.author: C. R.

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight and professional looking. High performance for work, school, and play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't think, Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. Sharp, clean, elegant, functional. By far the best choice on the market for portable gaming on a serious level.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Louis Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Best slim gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product, great quality, well built, super elegant design, would recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: DCarretero

customer_reviews.title: Love this PC
customer_reviews.text: I bought this PC for its video capabilities and it truly exceeds my expectations. I would recommend to anybody looking for the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: GkII

customer_reviews.title: Everything works and feels good so far
customer_reviews.text: It's a thin powerful laptop. Everything works and feels good so far. I'll give an update once I play more with it.
customer_reviews.author: George Asanache

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good, but small laptop
customer_reviews.text: A really nice computer especially for its size. (This is a really small laptop)
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnne Herbold

customer_reviews.title: So Cool! Plays all games!
customer_reviews.text: What a great laptop! Very sleek and smooth looking. Runs so well!
customer_reviews.author: Tony C

customer_reviews.title: Hot as Hell, and not in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laptop with one critical flaw. This device gets so hot even during the simplest of tasks. For its size and limited weight, it is a perfect "lap", laptop, but unfortunately this will burn your legs or crouch area. The fan is also loud and extremely obnoxious. If you are in the same room as someone while they are watching TV, and you are playing a game, it will drown out the TV. It's a real shame. This would be the perfect laptop otherwise. I cannot in good conscience recommend anyone buy this laptop. I will be returning it the first chance I get.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gaming laptop!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, amazing technology graphics are beautiful. my 13 year old son loves it !! A perfect gift on his birthday. i wish it was more affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: ExcaliberPC are great, however the computer is not workable...
customer_reviews.text: ExcaliberPC are great, however, the product isn't: Laptop comes with a dishonest offer of free headphones in exchange for reviewing the product - which could explain why the reviews here are so favorable, despite this product having so many faults, fails and being disappointingly unreliable: 1. Computer crashes often. 2. Wifi drops constantly. 3. Monitor flickers and dots appear frequently, mostly on battery. 4. These fails occur with multiple instances of the laptop. I would comment that the laptop is stunningly beautiful, slim and could have been a marvelous system, but is not reliable unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: ps51_boston

product_meta.title: MSI GS65 Stealth15.6" 144Hz 7ms Ultra Thin 4.9mm Bezel Gaming Laptop, GTX 1070 8G, i7-8750H (6 Cores) 16GB DDR4, 256GB SSD, RGB KB VR Ready,Metal Chassis, Black w/ Gold Diamond Cut, Win 10 Home 64bit
product_meta.description: MSI GS65 Stealth THIN-054 15.6" 144Hz 7ms Ultra Thin 4.9mm Bezel Gaming Laptop GTX 1070 8G Max-Q i7-8750H (6 Cores) 16GB 256GB SSD RGB KB VR Ready, Metal Chassis, Matte Black with Gold Diamond Cut
feature_bullets: Display: 15.6" FHD, 4.9mm Ultra Thin Bezel Anti-Glare Wide View Angle 144Hz 7ms 72% NTSC 1920x1080 16:9 | Operating System: Windows 10
Processor: New Intel Core i7-8750H 2.2 - 4.1GHz (6 Cores)
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1070 8G GDDR5
RAM: 16GB (8G*2) DDR4 2400MHz, 2 Sockets; Max Memory 32GB | Storage: 256GB SSD NVMe (PCIE Gen3x4)
Special Features: Ultra Thin Bezel | VR Ready | Steel series Per Key RGB Customizable Keyboard | Thunderbolt 3 Ready | LAN: Killer Gaming Network E2500 | Wireless: Killer N1550 Combo (2*2 ac)

specifications.Color: Matte Black with Gold Diamond Cut
